channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 07:21 Air alert in Volyn region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 07:21 Air alert in Volyn region. Follow further messages. #Volyn_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 07:04 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 07:04 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
